entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, mentioned as a Gryffindor student who didn't put his name in the goblet. He's being celebrated by his peers.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina swooped down upon Harry and said 'Oh if it couldn't be me, at least it's a Gryffindor'. She seems to be excited about the celebration.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is another Gryffindor Chaser who shouted 'You'll be able to pay back Diggory for that last Quidditch match, Harry!' She's teasing Harry about the Quidditch match.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is mentioned as someone Harry owes a debt to in the Quidditch match. His name is not further elaborated on in the text.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan unearthed a Gryffindor banner and insisted on draping it around Harry like a cloak. He's trying to celebrate Harry's win.

relationships.description: Harry owes Diggory for the last Quidditch match, as mentioned by Katie Bell.
Lee Jordan is celebrating Harry's win by draping a Gryffindor banner around him.
